summary: Professional 5-page advocate website for Advocate Nishanth H C (Nishanth HC Advocate) in Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka. Being rebuilt from scratch as a React + TypeScript app (replacing static HTML/CSS/JS) due to blank white screen rendering issues in preview. White/gold premium theme (#d4af37 accents). All 5 pages: Home, About, Cases, Appointment, Contact. Features: sticky navbar with NHC logo, WhatsApp appointment form, language switcher (EN/Kannada/Hindi) with localStorage, scroll reveal animations, 3D card effects, counter animation, glassmorphism, SEO meta + JSON-LD on all pages, Google Maps embed, pulsing WhatsApp float button.
architectural_notes: WhatsApp form submission opens wa.me/919482929768 with encoded appointment message
Language switcher (EN/Kannada/Hindi) uses JS innerHTML swap, no page reload
Scroll reveal uses Intersection Observer API; 3D tilt uses mousemove on cards
All images loaded from postimg.cc URLs with JS error fallback handling
JSON-LD LegalService structured data and Open Graph tags on every page
Favicon uses inline SVG data URI with NHC gold text on dark circle
Project rebuilt as React + TypeScript SPA (replacing static HTML/CSS/JS) to fix blank white screen rendering in preview
React Router used for client-side routing; default route '/' loads Home page

existing_features.title: Create index.html (Home page) with: (1) SEO meta tags ‚Äî title 'Advocate Nishanth H C | Legal Services in Chikkamagaluru', description, keywords, Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:type: website, og:image using hero image URL), and JSON-LD LegalService structured data block; (2) Sticky navbar with SVG/text NHC logo in gold (#d4af37) top-left and navigation links Home | About | Cases | Appointment | Contact with active state on Home; (3) Full-screen hero section using background image https://i.postimg.cc/dt02VtTd/Whats_App_Image_2026_02_26_at_6_16_08_PM.jpg with dark overlay, animated heading 'Advocate Nishanth H C', subheading '5+ Years of Legal Experience', tagline 'All Legal Services | Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka', CTA buttons 'Book Appointment' (gold filled, links to appointment.html) and 'WhatsApp Now' (gold outline, links to https://wa.me/919482929768), and scroll indicator arrow; (4) Language switcher section with EN / ‡≤ï‡≤®‡≥ç‡≤®‡≤° / ‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä buttons and dynamic tagline text; (5) Stats section with four counters: 5+ Years Experience, 500+ Cases Handled, 100% Dedication, All Legal Services; (6) Services cards section with five cards (Civil ‚öñÔ∏è, Criminal üõ°Ô∏è, Family üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß, Property üè†, Documentation üìÑ) each with icon, title, description, 3D hover effect and gold border on hover; (7) Pulsing fixed WhatsApp button bottom-right linking to https://wa.me/919482929768; (8) Footer with NHC logo left, quick links center, contact details right, gold divider, copyright '¬© 2026 Nishanth HC Advocate. All Rights Reserved.'

Create about.html (About page) with: (1) Same SEO meta, OG, and JSON-LD as all pages; (2) Shared sticky navbar with active state on About; (3) Hero banner section with title 'About Advocate Nishanth H C'; (4) Two-column layout ‚Äî left column: About Page Image https://i.postimg.cc/PrqW5r8P/Whats_App_Image_2026_02_26_at_6_16_07_PM.jpg, right column: professional title with gold underline, 5+ Years Experience badge, professional bio paragraphs about legal expertise, areas of practice list with gold checkmarks, Bar Council enrollment details, office address block with map pin icon, contact details block; (5) Additional Professional Image section using https://i.postimg.cc/RV0rRf2D/Whats-App-Image-2026-02-26-at-7-46-51-PM.jpg; (6) Glassmorphism quote block with a legal philosophy quote; (7) Scroll reveal animations throughout; (8) Pulsing WhatsApp float button; (9) Shared footer. If any image fails to load, show a clearly labeled placeholder with a comment in the HTML indicating where the URL can be replaced.

Create cases.html (Cases/Services page) with: (1) Same SEO meta, OG, and JSON-LD as all pages; (2) Shared sticky navbar with active state on Cases; (3) Hero banner 'Legal Services by Advocate Nishanth H C' using Cases hero image https://i.postimg.cc/ncL4hcQ9/Whats_App_Image_2026_02_26_at_6_16_08_PM_(1).jpg as background with dark overlay; (4) Five detailed service category cards: Civil Cases (‚öñÔ∏è, Property disputes, injunctions, recovery suits, civil appeals, execution petitions), Criminal Defence (üõ°Ô∏è, Bail applications, criminal trials, anticipatory bail, sessions court matters), Family Law (üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß, Divorce, maintenance, custody, adoption, domestic violence), Property & Registration (üè†, Sale deeds, gift deeds, property registration, title verification, encumbrance), Legal Documentation (üìÑ, Legal notices, affidavits, agreements, power of attorney, contracts) ‚Äî each card with scroll reveal animation, 3D hover effect, and gold accent; (5) Call-to-action section 'Need Legal Help?' with button linking to appointment.html; (6) Pulsing WhatsApp float button; (7) Shared footer.

Create appointment.html (Appointment page) with: (1) Same SEO meta, OG, and JSON-LD as all pages; (2) Shared sticky navbar with active state on Appointment; (3) Hero banner 'Book Appointment with Advocate Nishanth H C'; (4) Two-column layout ‚Äî left column shows contact info (phone +91 94829 29768, email adv.nishanthhc@gmail.com) and office hours (Monday‚ÄìSaturday: 10:00 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM, Sunday: By Appointment Only); right column contains the appointment form with fields: Full Name (text), Phone Number (tel), Preferred Date (date), Case Type (select: Civil Case | Criminal Defence | Family Law | Property & Registration | Legal Documentation | Other), Message/Details (textarea), and submit button 'Send via WhatsApp'; (5) On form submit: validate all fields, construct WhatsApp message in the specified format (Hello Advocate Nishanth H C, Name: [name], Phone: [phone], Date: [date], Case Type: [case type], Details: [message]), URL-encode it, and open https://wa.me/919482929768?text=ENCODED_MESSAGE; (6) Pulsing WhatsApp float button; (7) Shared footer.

Create contact.html (Contact page) with: (1) Same SEO meta, OG, and JSON-LD as all pages; (2) Shared sticky navbar with active state on Contact; (3) Hero banner 'Contact Nishanth HC Advocate'; (4) Three-column info cards: Phone card (+91 94829 29768, clickable tel:+919482929768 link), Email card (adv.nishanthhc@gmail.com, clickable mailto link), WhatsApp card (click-to-chat button linking to https://wa.me/919482929768); (5) Full address block for 'Nishanth HC Advocate, #T, 6th Cross Road, Block 9, Ward No 2, Vasathi Badavane, Hiremgaluru, Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka, India'; (6) Embedded Google Maps iframe using URL https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3877.123456789!2d75.7760!3d13.3161!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x3bbad4e87f4e1b5d%3A0x123456789!2sVasathi%20Badavane%2C%20Hiremgaluru%2C%20Karnataka!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sin!4v1234567890; (7) Large WhatsApp CTA section; (8) Pulsing WhatsApp float button; (9) Shared footer.

Apply a consistent premium visual theme across all 7 files: white/off-white backgrounds (#ffffff, #f8f8f5), gold (#d4af37) accents on borders, underlines, icons, badges, and hover states, Playfair Display headings, Inter body text, smooth scroll behavior (scroll-behavior: smooth on html element), scroll reveal fade/slide-in animations via IntersectionObserver, mobile-first responsive layout with hamburger menu on screens ‚â§768px, and an inline SVG or CSS text-based 'NHC' logo styled in gold used consistently in the navbar and footer across all five HTML pages. Ensure all internal links use relative paths (about.html, cases.html, appointment.html, contact.html, index.html).

In frontend/public/index.html, about.html, cases.html, appointment.html, and contact.html: wire up scroll reveal animations on every section using IntersectionObserver so elements fade/slide in as they enter the viewport; apply 3D perspective tilt hover effects to all service cards and CTA buttons via JavaScript mousemove listeners; ensure smooth scroll is set via `html { scroll-behavior: smooth; }` in the shared stylesheet; and apply glassmorphism styling (backdrop-filter: blur, semi-transparent background, subtle border) to quote blocks, stat cards, and modal overlays consistently across all pages.

Implement a fully functional JavaScript-based language switcher on frontend/public/index.html (and any page that displays the switcher) with three buttons: EN (English, default), ‡≤ï‡≤®‡≥ç‡≤®‡≤° (Kannada), and ‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä (Hindi). All user-visible text on the page must update dynamically via a JS translation object without page reload. There must be no duplicated content sections ‚Äî a single set of HTML elements is reused and their text nodes are replaced by the switcher. The switcher must persist the selected language across page navigations using localStorage.

Fully wire the appointment form in frontend/public/appointment.html. The form must collect: Full Name (required, text), Phone Number (required, tel), Preferred Date (required, date), Case Type (required, select: Civil Case | Criminal Defence | Family Law | Property & Registration | Legal Documentation | Other), and Message/Details (required, textarea). On submit: validate that all fields are non-empty and show inline error messages for any missing field; construct the WhatsApp message exactly as 'Hello Advocate Nishanth H C, Name: [name], Phone: [phone], Date: [date], Case Type: [case type], Details: [message]'; URL-encode the full message and open https://wa.me/919482929768?text=ENCODED_MESSAGE in a new tab.

In frontend/public/contact.html, replace or update the Google Maps embed iframe to target Vasathi Badavane, Hiremgaluru, Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka, India. Use a valid embed URL such as https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Vasathi+Badavane,+Hiremgaluru,+Chikkamagaluru,+Karnataka,+India&output=embed or the existing embed URL already in the file. The iframe must have width: 100%, an appropriate fixed height (e.g., 400px), be wrapped in a responsive container, and load without CORS or sandbox errors. Include loading='lazy' and a title attribute for accessibility.

Ensure all five pages (index.html, about.html, cases.html, appointment.html, contact.html) in frontend/public load the correct images with proper fallback handling. Hero background on index.html must use https://i.postimg.cc/dt02VtTd/Whats_App_Image_2026_02_26_at_6_16_08_PM.jpg. About page left-column image must use https://i.postimg.cc/PrqW5r8P/Whats_App_Image_2026_02_26_at_6_16_07_PM.jpg. Cases hero background must use https://i.postimg.cc/ncL4hcQ9/Whats_App_Image_2026_02_26_at_6_16_08_PM_(1).jpg. Additional professional image must use https://i.postimg.cc/RV0rRf2D/Whats-App-Image-2026-02-26-at-7-46-51-PM.jpg. Add onerror fallback on all tags to show a labeled gold-bordered placeholder if an image fails to load.

Ensure consistent branding across all five pages in frontend/public: Display 'Advocate Nishanth H C' as the full name in the hero/banner heading on every page. Show '5+ Years Experience' prominently as a badge or highlighted text on index.html and about.html. Display the complete office address ‚Äî 'Nishanth HC Advocate, #T, 6th Cross Road, Block 9, Ward No 2, Vasathi Badavane, Hiremgaluru, Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka, India' ‚Äî properly formatted in the footer and contact/about pages. Make the phone number (+91 94829 29768, href: tel:+919482929768) and email (adv.nishanthhc@gmail.com, href: mailto:adv.nishanthhc@gmail.com) clickable wherever they appear on every page.

Audit and ensure complete SEO metadata on all five pages in frontend/public. Each page must have: a unique, keyword-rich <title> tag; a <meta name='description'> tag; a <meta name='keywords'> tag; Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:type: website, og:image using the hero image URL); and a <script type='application/ld+json'> block with LegalService structured data including name 'Nishanth HC Advocate', address (Vasathi Badavane, Hiremgaluru, Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka, India), telephone (+919482929768), and url fields.

Ensure the sticky navbar is identical and fully functional across all five pages in frontend/public. The navbar must: show the NHC logo in gold (#d4af37) top-left; include navigation links Home | About | Cases | Appointment | Contact with relative hrefs (index.html, about.html, cases.html, appointment.html, contact.html); highlight the active page link in gold; collapse into a hamburger menu on screens ‚â§768px with a toggleable mobile dropdown; and scroll to a scrolled/opaque state when the page is scrolled more than 50px.

Rebuild the entire advocate website from scratch as a React + TypeScript single-page application using React Router for client-side routing. The current static HTML files in frontend/public are causing blank white screens in preview. Replace frontend/src/App.tsx with a fully functional React app that defines routes for '/' (Home), '/about', '/cases', '/appointment', and '/contact'. Ensure the app mounts correctly from frontend/src/main.tsx into the #root div in frontend/index.html (the Vite entry point). All five pages must render their full content using React components ‚Äî no blank screens.

Create a shared React Layout component that wraps all pages with: (1) A sticky navbar showing the NHC logo in gold (#d4af37) top-left, navigation links Home | About | Cases | Appointment | Contact using React Router Links, active link highlighted in gold, hamburger menu on screens ‚â§768px with toggleable mobile dropdown, opaque/scrolled state when page is scrolled more than 50px; (2) A pulsing fixed WhatsApp float button bottom-right linking to https://wa.me/919482929768; (3) A shared footer with NHC logo left, quick links center, full contact details right (address: Nishanth HC Advocate, #T, 6th Cross Road, Block 9, Ward No 2, Vasathi Badavane, Hiremgaluru, Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka, India; phone: +91 94829 29768 as tel:+919482929768; email: adv.nishanthhc@gmail.com as mailto link), gold divider, copyright '¬© 2026 Nishanth HC Advocate. Apply the premium visual theme consistently across all React page components using Tailwind CSS and a shared global stylesheet. Requirements: white/off-white backgrounds (#ffffff, #f8f8f5), gold (#d4af37) accents on borders, underlines, icons, badges, and hover states; Playfair Display font for headings (loaded via Google Fonts), Inter for body text; smooth scroll behavior (html { scroll-behavior: smooth }); glassmorphism styling (backdrop-filter: blur, semi-transparent background, subtle border) on quote blocks, stat cards, and modal overlays; scroll reveal fade/slide-in animations via IntersectionObserver or a React hook equivalent; 3D perspective tilt hover effects via mousemove listeners on all service cards and CTA buttons; mobile-first responsive layout; NHC logo styled in gold consistently in navbar and footer.
